meanings.definition: A disease affecting pigs caused by a virus.
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the swinepoxes spreading among the pigs.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian treated the swinepoxes outbreak in the pigsty.
meanings.sent3: The swinepoxes seemed to be having a party in the pigpen!
meanings.sent4: The swinepoxes crept through the herd like a silent thief in the night.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the swinepoxes-infected pigs was a somber reminder of nature's power.

meanings.definition: The plural form of swinepox, referring to multiple cases of the disease in pigs.
meanings.sent1: The farm was hit hard by swinepoxes, affecting many pigs.
meanings.sent2: The swinepoxes cases were on the rise, causing concern among farmers.
meanings.sent3: It was like a parade of swinepoxes marching through the barn!
meanings.sent4: The swinepoxes multiplied like wildfire, spreading from pig to pig.
meanings.sent5: The barn echoed with the oinks of pigs suffering from swinepoxes.
